name: me no like driving
description:
What can possibly go wrong when driving at night?  Try not to run out of gas or destroy your car, then we'll find out...

Controls:

[W/S] for acceleration.

[A/D] for turning.

[Space] to brake.

Gas: Always depleting. Collect cans so that you don't run out of gas!

Vehicle Health: Depletes when you collide with obstacles.
